body: Someone needs to have a closer look to this but just a quick check shows there is a difference between the mesh face area if I use the Area component or calculate it for each face and add them up together. Since your geometry doesn't have non-planar faces, or that's what I assumed, we shouldn't have this difference. This can by itself be the source of the error.
